participant_1.background:
I am eighteen years old.
I am going to majoring in business.
I just bought my first car.
I received a full scholarship to florida state university.

participant_2.background:
I like eating fresh mangoes in the morning.
Going snorkeling is my favorite thing to do.
I like chasing komodo lizards on a private island.
Sometimes i listen to gary numan to be ironic.
I only use apple products because i feel everything else is inferior.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go snorkeling! It's so relaxing and beautiful to see the underwater world.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to try snorkeling, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to see all the amazing creatures that live in the ocean.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem!
So, what's your favorite thing about college?
I love the freedom! Being able to choose my own classes and decide what I want to learn is amazing.
I can imagine! I'm really looking forward to that.
It's great! But it can also be overwhelming, so just remember to take it one step at a time.
Thanks for the advice!
No problem!
So, what's your favorite class so far?
I'm really enjoying my business class! It's a lot of work, but it's also really interesting.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks!
So, what do you want to do after college?
I'm not sure yet! I'm thinking about going to grad school, but I'm not sure what I want to specialize in.
That's okay! You have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks!
So, what's your favorite thing about yourself?
I'm really hard-working and ambitious. I always put my best foot forward and I never give up.
That's great! I'm sure you'll accomplish great things in life.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you think the best thing about the world is?
I think the best thing about the world is the people in it. We're all so different, but we all have the potential to make a difference.
I agree! I think the world is a beautiful place, and I'm so grateful to be a part of it.
Me too!
